    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound experiments - the slinky spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltige Experimente - der schleichende 
Frühling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences saines - le ressort furtif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiências sadias - a mola slinky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimenti sani - molla slinky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιή πειράματα - το κρυψίνους ελατήριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimentos sanos - el resorte slinky</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a tuning fork attached to one end of a slinky spring. When the fork is vibrating, the prongs of the fork pull the end of the slinky moving it forwards and backwards.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slinky spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tuning fork</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Stimmgabel, die zu 
einem Ende eines schleichenden Frühlinges angebracht wird. Wenn
die Gabel vibriert, die Zinken des Gabelzuges, den das Ende vom 
schleichenden, es verschiebend und rückwärts nachschickt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un diapason attaché à
une extrémité d'un ressort furtif. Quand la fourchette 
vibre, les fourches de la traction de fourchette que la fin du 
furtif la déplaçant expédie et vers l'arrière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma forquilha ajustando 
unida a uma extremidade de uma mola slinky. Quando a forquilha 
vibrar, os prongs da tração que da forquilha o fim do slinky movendo
o envía e para trás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un diapason fissato 
ad un'estremità di una molla slinky. Quando la forcella sta 
vibrando, i poli del tiro che della forcella la conclusione dello 
slinky spostandolo spedisce ed indietro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συντονίζοντας δίκρανο που
συνδέεται με ένα τέλος ενός κρυψίνους ελατηρίου. Όταν το 
δίκρανο δονείται, prongs του δικράνου τραβούν το τέλος του 
κρυψίνους κινώντας το προς τα εμπρός και προς τα πίσω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un diapasón asociado a 
un extremo de un resorte slinky. Cuando la fork está vibrando, 
los dientes del tirón de la fork que el final del slinky moviéndolo 
remite y al revés.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schleichender Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltige Experimente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
